docs.title: Gym Tracker Docs
docs.text:
This website has the purpose of documenting the Gym Tracker project. Most of the project's documentation artifacts are documented here, including its requirements, architecture, implementation details, and deployment instructions.

  • About

This is a personal project developed by lipeaaraujo.

I initially developed this project to practice my skills in web development and to create a tool that I could use to track my workouts. I hope you find this project useful. Feel free to contribute to this project by submitting issues or pull requests and by checking out the project's:

  • GitHub repository
  • Contributing guidelines
  • Code of conduct

docs.title: About
docs.text:
GymTracker is a personal fitness web app designed to help users stay motivated and organized in their fitness journey. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced athlete, this app makes it easy to track your workout progress, set goals, and monitor performance over time. By logging exercises, sets, repetitions, and weights, you can get a clear picture of your growth and achievements.

  • Website
  • API Endpoints
  • GitHub Repository

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• User Authentication: Create an account to access your personal data and track your progress.
  • Workout Log: Log your exercises, sets, repetitions, and weights to keep track of your workouts.
  • Progress Tracking: Monitor your performance over time and set goals to achieve your fitness objectives.

docs.title: Technologies
docs.text:
MERN Stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js):

  • Frontend: React (Website)
  • Backend: Node.js, Express
  • Database: MongoDB
